author: sky.cactus
content: What is a good website that tracks base fee over time and in realtime?

author: sky.cactus
content:
I would like one website that answers the following questions:
1. What is the base fee of the latest block?
2. What is the base fee of the pending block?
3. What is the last time the base fee was below x?
4. What does base fee seasonality look like over the last day?
5. What does base fee seasonality look like over the last month?
6. What does the base fee seasonality look like over all time?

author: gwintery
content: Most (but not all) should be shown at watchtheburn.com

author: gwintery
content: You can head over to the 'insights' for base fee data over time
